data.name: Fight Songs: The Music Of Team Fortress 2
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack to Team Fortress 2, performed by the Valve Studio Orchestra.

Tracklist:
  • Medic! 02:34
  • Intruder Alert 01:53
  • The Calm 02:32
  • Dapper Cadaver 01:58
  • Dreams of Cruelty 01:05
  • A Little Heart to Heart 01:36
  • RED Triumphs! 01:38
  • Faster than a Speeding Bullet 01:21
  • It Hates Me So Much 02:11
  • Rocket Jump Waltz 00:40
  • Drunken Pipe Bomb 01:32
  • Three Days to Live 01:57
  • Misfortune Teller 02:34
  • Archimedes 04:04
  • Soldier of Dance 01:09
  • Playing with Danger 04:03
  • Haunted Fortress 01:23
  • Rise of the Living Bread 02:37
  • Robots! 03:35
  • The Art of War 02:18
  • Petite Chou-Fleur 01:44
  • Seduce Me! 01:20
  • More Gun 03:13
  • BLU Triumphs! 01:39
  • Stink Lines 01:35
  • Right Behind You 01:40
  • Red Bread 02:11
  • Team Fortress 2 01:15
  • Carousel of Curses 00:44
Songs will be placed in your TF2 folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Team Fortress 2\Soundtrack

data.short_description: The official soundtrack to Team Fortress 2, performed by the Valve Studio Orchestra. Tracklist:Medic! 02:34Intruder Alert 01:53The Calm 02:32Dapper Cadaver 01:58Dreams of Cruelty 01:05A Little Heart to Heart 01:36RED Triumphs!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7 (32/64-bit)/Vista/XP
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 and above
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
